item.description:
Bonjour!
Il y aura a great opportunity to see two French films with your French-speaking friends! This is in addition to our regular Wednesday evening conversations. Come join us!!
Manchester Community College is near the exit #1 from !-384 and the road signs are posted to direct you.
The new auditorium is next to the 5-story tower. Parking is in lot "C".

The MCC French Club, Presents
a FREE double feature!

The 2nd Annual French Film Festival
November 13th, 2009 6:00 p. m. "Paris, je t'aime"

With Petit Fours and Truffles at intermission

Courtesy of MCC Culinary Arts Department

Free Screenings of: Paris je t'aime @ 18:00
Cache @ 8:00
(Films are in French With English Subtitles and are rated R.)
item.how_to_find_us: Will be wearing Meetup name tag

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French films at MCC
